text: That's good. Its tough, it's true that animation can be a pretty tough career. Especially in the first 5 years or so. But it does get much easier after that. I think it's generally hard for the older generation to understand someone wanting to follow their passion, as it wasn't an option for them usually :(
Yeah I'm quite scared because I know it is a hard industry to squeeze your way into but I want ti take the risk ^^
